description: One of Misaki and Sakura`s friends, a sensible and intelligent girl who often spends lunchtime with them. Shizuko is a member of the flower arranging club and is good at math, but isn`t very good at physical activities. She has an older brother in university and a younger sister in junior high school; according to Sakura, the three of them look very alike.
name: Kaga Shizuko
